name: SGLang Server
description: SGLang Server loads models for multimodal inference using Huggingface Transformers for generation.

gpu_ids.title: GPU IDs to use for Inference. Leaving blank will use all available GPUs

model_dtype.title: Select a specific data type for the model

gpu_ids.ui:help: Specify a comma-separated list of GPU IDs to use for inference. The IDs for each GPU can be found in the Computer tab. For example: 0,1,2,3

model_dtype.ui:help: Select a specific data type for the model. This might help with older GPUs that do not support bfloat16
